get the source from http://voxel.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/lmms/lmms-0.1.4.tar.bz2 and build it for yourself
how to i build?
in a terminal, "tar xf lmms*.bz2; sudo apt-get build-dep lmms; cd lmms; ./configure; make" or something like that
